name: Acrobatics
desc: A dexterity check that covers any attempt to stay on your feet in a tricky situation, such as when you're trying to balance on a tightrope or stay upright on a rocking ship’s deck. The Game Master might also call for this skillo check when you try to perform acrobatic stunts, such as dives or flips.

name: Animal Handling
desc: A wisdom check when there is any question whether you can calm down a domesticated animal, keep a mount from getting spooked, or intuit an animal’s intentions. You also make this skill check to control your mount when attempting a risky maneuver.

name: Arcana
desc: An intelligence check that measures your ability to recall lore about spells, magic items, eldritch symbols, magical traditions, the planes of existence, and the inhabitants of those planes.

name: Athletics
desc: A strength check that covers difficult situations you encounter while climbing, jumping, or swimming.

name: Deception
desc: A charisma check that determines whether you can convincingly hide the truth, either verbally or through your actions.

name: History
desc: An intelligence check that measures your ability to recall lore about historical events, legendary people, ancient kingdoms, past disputes, recent wars, and lost civilizations.

name: Insight
desc: A wisdon check that decides whether you can determine the true intentions of a creature, such as as when searching out a lie or predicting someone’s next move.

name: Intimidation
desc: A charisma check when you attempt to influence someone through overt threats, hostile actions, or physical violence.

name: Investigation
desc: An intelligence check when you look around for clues and make deductions based on those clues. You might deduce the location of a hidden object, discern from the appearance of a wound what kind of weapon dealt it, or determine the weakest point of a tunnel that could cause it to collapse.

name: Medicine
desc: A wisdom check that lets you try to stabilize a dying companion or diagnose an illness.

name: Nature
desc: An intelligence check that measures your ability to recall lore about terrain, plants, and animals, the weather, and natural cycles.

name: Perception
desc: A wisdom check that lets you spot, hear, or otherwise detect the presence of something. It measures your general awareness of your surroundings and the keenness of your senses.

name: Performance
desc: A charisma check that determines how well you can delight an audience with music, dancing, acting, storytelling, or some other form of entertainment.

name: Persuasion
desc: A charisma check for when you attempt to influence someone or a group of people with tact, social graces, or good nature.

name: Religion
desc: An intelligence check that meaasures your ability to recall lore about deities, rites and prayers, religious hierarchies, holy symbols, and the practices of secret cults.

name: Sleight of Hand
desc: A dexterity check for whenever you attempt an act of legerdemain or manual trickery, such as planting something on someone else or concealing an object on your person.

name: Stealth
desc: A dexterity check for when you attempt to conceal yourself from enemies, slink past guards, slip away without being noticed, or sneak up on someone without being seen or heard.

name: Survival
desc: A wisdom check when you try to follow tracks, hunt wild game, guide your group through hostile terrains, identify signs of nearby predators, predict the weather, or avoid natural hazards.
